acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames

constraints: Use English for all user-facing UI text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (single-canister backend).
Do not modify files under frontend immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
Payments must use Stripe (no third-party auth providers; Internet Identity only if accounts are later added).
nonGoals: Admin/owner dashboard for managing products (e.g., WordPress-like editing) is out of scope for this build.
User accounts (login, order history tied to a user) are optional and not included unless requested next.
Wishlist feature is optional and not included unless requested next.
Real-time features (chat, WebSockets, push notifications) are out of scope.

goalsToAdd: Build a mobile-friendly e-commerce website for handcrafted products with product browsing, cart, checkout, and payments.
preferencesToAdd: User-facing text should be in English.
